heroes.name: Beastmen Chieftain
heroes.description:
Beastmen chieftains have gained their position
through sheer brutality. He leads the Beastmen
to Mordheim to gather the Chaos Stones to his
Herdstone

rules.name: Leader
rules.effect: Any Warrior within 6 of the Beastman Chieftain may use his Leadership when taking Ld tests

heroes.name: Beastmen Shaman
heroes.description:
Beastmen Shamans are prophets of the Dark
Gods, and the most respected of all the
Beastmen

rules.name: Wizard
rules.effect:
A Beastmen Shaman is a Wizard
and may use Chaos Rituals, as detailed
in the Magic section
